cause.description:
Helping Ann Klass make good decisions since February '07.
1. Bald men with southern accents are no good.
2. If a guy compares your arms to the stomach of a fish, its no good.
3. cage fighter? forget about it.
4. water bed? swim away.
cause.mission: spread awareness about the underbellies of flounder in the chesapeake bay
cause.name: Oh God Ann, That Could Have Been You
